manifest_description.message: <flag> The Hacker's Browser. Vimium provides keyboard shortcuts for navigation and control in the spirit of Vim.

scroll_to_top.message: Scroll to the top of the page

scroll_to_bottom.message: Scroll to the bottom of the page

scroll_to_left.message: Scroll all the way to the left

scroll_to_right.message: Scroll all the way to the right

copy_current_url.message: Copy the current URL to the clipboard

link_hints_activate_mode_to_copy_link_ur.message: Copy a link URL to the clipboard

open_copied_url_in_current_tab.message: Open the clipboard's URL in the current tab

open_copied_url_in_new_tab.message: Open the clipboard's URL in a new tab

focus_input.message: Focus the first (or n-th) text box on the page

link_hints_activate_mode.message: Open a link in the current tab

link_hints_activate_mode_to_open_in_new_.message: Open a link in a new tab

link_hints_activate_mode_with_queue.message: Open multiple links in a new tab

link_hints_activate_mode_to_open_incogni.message: Open a link in incognito window

perform_find.message: Cycle forward to the next find match

perform_backwards_find.message: Cycle backward to the previous find match

go_previous.message: Follow the link labeled previous or <

go_next.message: Follow the link labeled next or >

go_to_root.message: Go to root of current URL hierarchy

vomnibar_activate.message: Open URL, bookmark, or history entry

vomnibar_activate_in_new_tab.message: Open URL, bookmark, history entry, in a new tab

vomnibar_activate_bookmarks_in_new_tab.message: Open a bookmark in a new tab

next_frame.message: Cycle forward to the next frame on the page

open_with_queue.message: Open multiple links in a new tab
